thread.title: Melania Trump Applauds Emily Ratajkowski on Twitter After Actress Defends Her
thread.title_full: Melania Trump Applauds Emily Ratajkowski on Twitter After Actress Defends Her

author: Josh Feldman
title: Melania Trump Applauds Emily Ratajkowski on Twitter After Actress Defends Her
text:
Melania Trump Applauds Emily Ratajkowski on Twitter After Actress Defends Her by Josh Feldman | 8:15   official FLOTUS Twitter account tweeted words of praise for actress Emily Ratajkowski after she tweeted her shock at what a reporter told her last night about Melania Trump . 
Ratajkowski revealed today that last night a New York Times reporter told her “Melania is a hooker.” She was disturbed by the “slut shaming” and said regardless of politics people shouldn’t stand for this kind of talk. 
The reporter has since been reprimanded and the First Lady tweeted this out earlier tonight: Applause to all women around the world who speak up, stand up and support other women! @emrata #PowerOfEveryWoman #PowerOfTheFirstLady 
— Melania Trump (@FLOTUS) February 14, 2017 
[ image via a katz/Shutterstock ]
